sentences.en: A photography and design major, Yip a graduate of Hong Kong Polytechnic University.
sentences.cn: 叶锦添毕业于香港理工大学摄影与设计专业.

sentences.en: Conservative Baptist Lui Ming Choi Primary School presented their community design for Kai Yip Estate.
sentences.cn: 浸信宣道会吕明才小学上午校的同学介绍他们的设计–安居乐业在启业.

sentences.en: Far up the west rim of the canyon, a coyote yipped twice.
sentences.cn: 远处峡谷的西岸，一只丛林狼嚎叫了两声。

sentences.en: I am Irene Yip . I like dogs and freaks. And I like handbags, sometimes.
sentences.cn: 我是叶爱莲. 我喜欢狗和古怪的人. 有时喜欢手袋.

sentences.en: I hate the yip of our neighbor's dog at midnight.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌咱们邻居家半夜的狗吠声.

sentences.en: It is at ground level at rear lane between How Ming Street and Chong Yip Street.
sentences.cn: 位于巧明街及创业街之间的后巷地面.

sentences.en: It is at ground level at the junction of Hung To Road and Tsun Yip Street.
sentences.cn: 位于地面并在鸿图道与骏业街交界处.

sentences.en: Judge Eddie Yip said he might impose jail terms.
sentences.cn: 法官叶佐文(EddieYip)称,他可能会判处二人入狱.

sentences.en: Kung Fu really kind, perfect to show a generation of kungfu master - the legendary Yip Man's life.
sentences.cn: 拳拳真功夫, 完美展现了一代功夫宗师——叶问的人生传奇.

sentences.en: The dogs began to yip and howl, but tonight they kept their places.
sentences.cn: 狗也摆好阵势,要狂吠了, 但是今晚,他们按兵不动.

sentences.en: The lonely traveler was scared by the yip of tykes.
sentences.cn: 那个孤独的旅行者被野狗的狂吠声给吓坏了.

sentences.en: When the stranger comes into yard, the dogs come out and yip.
sentences.cn: 陌生人一进院子, 狗儿们就跑出来狂吠.

sentences.en: Writer Yip is inspired by his mission and decides to work with him.
sentences.cn: 叶在目睹冯一次行动后,决定跟随他工作.

sentences.en: Yip , Wailim. Comparative Poetics. Taipei: East University Book Company, 1983.
sentences.cn: 叶维廉 :《比较诗学》. 台北: 台北东大图书公司, 1983年.

trans.tran_en: If a dog or other animal yips, it gives a sudden short cry, often because of fear or pain
